MainSceneFirstLoad: ^Well, here we are, two days later and out of rations. But we made it.
^Technically, the lichen we found was edibl-
^EDIBLE MY ASS! That thing looked mushy and disgusting, ew!
^If someone hadn't kept triggering traps, maybe, just maybe, we would have enough spells for creating food, but given out track record I'm saving the heals...
^... I hope you step on a trap.
^Alright, alright, everyone be a dear and let's stop the petty squabble.~ We've got treasure to hunt.
^Remember, we are not here to plunder.
^Of course, of course, we are doing... archeological research.
MainCorridorFirstScene: ^So, four rooms... four of us. Simple math.
PuzzleRogueFirstTile: ^... I really hope the rest also have death traps and I didn't just get the densely packed with traps room.
PuzzleMageFirstLoad: ^Well if that's here then surely runes are to follow.
^Good thing I always keep my grimoire [spacebar] at hand.
^I never quite bothered to learn rune reading by heart.
PuzzleClericFirstLoad: ^Normally you use these to avoid having to draw and erase glyphs on the same space.
^Well, let's check my book of lore [spacebar].
^I wonder which ones are required here, perhaps I should look around.
PuzzleClericOloMask: ^Oh, well that's unexpected, a mask of olo here... Lucky it was me who found it.
^The others would have fallen for his aura. Thank you father of preservation for granting me your protection.
PuzzleClericPermasMask: ^A mask of... Is this Permas or was it Permut? No matter, the other is bound to be nearby.
PuzzleClericPermutMask: ^A mask of... Is this Permut or was it Permas? No matter, the other is bound to be nearby.
PuzzleBardFirstLoad: ^My! My! What do we have here?
^I did not know we were in the fancy kind of decrepit ruins. If it isn't an orchestrion!
^I should try and tune it up, see if I can record the song for my repertoire~.
PuzzleRogueWrongCharacter: ^What do you mean you have reconsidered? ;-;
PuzzleMageWrongCharacter: ^I'm plenty sure you won't stand a chance in there so better let me go in this one.
PuzzleClericWrongCharacter: ^There's a certain... holiness to this room, I shall be the one to go in.
^(I also checked the others and I prefer this one.)
PuzzleBardWrongCharacter: ^Would you mind if I go in this one? I hear a faint melody from within and we all know I'm the only one that knows how to play an instrument.
SwapDialogueCleric: ^Tired of working? Guess I can give it a go now.
SwapDialogueBard: ^Shall I lead the way for a bit?
RogueStatueInteraction: ^Huh, that's a disgusting looking... what is this exactly?
^Oh, yeah, the puzzle, let's hope I can get through without triggering any traps!
MageStatueInteraction: ^Looks biological but th- then again- again- R again- again- A again-
^I’m so going to study rune reading when I get out, would save me so much time.
ClericStatueInteraction: ^It couldn’t b- C behh-. T b…
^I should focus on the mirrors, better be out quick to heal the cat.
BardStatueInteraction: ^Yes the song! I almost forgot, silly me, let’s better focus.
PuzzleRogueSolvedAlready: ^Nope, nop, no, nop nop, nope. Not going in there again.
PuzzleMageSolvedAlready: ^I already had enough ancient magic thrown at me for today, thanks.
PuzzleClericSolvedAlready: ^I already paid enough attention to other gods, don't want to get the boss jealous.
PuzzleBardSolvedAlready: ^There was nothing to be done there, lucky me!~
FinalCorridorScene: ^It seems like the door has opened... Rogue.
^I think you should go first, is what he's saying.
^Wait what? Why?! I'm not a tank!
^Neither are we, have you noticed that we are all ranged spellcasters?
^Indeed, we provide cover and protection. You attack with knives, melee range.
^C'mon don't worry, I'll ready a shield spell in case anything goes wrong.
^Isn't the Shield spell a self targetting spell?
^I might have taught him a lil bit of magic...
FinalRoom: ^Wait, this is all? A fricking coffin?
^It is a bit... Dissappointing though... Maybe there's something of value inside?
^Mhmmm, I dunno... I mean it's not like they'll miss it but...
^Well, I'm not leaving with my hands empty so-
^You alright there bud? You went sil-
EndingGood: ^A locket? Like, the ones you keep a picture in?
^Hey it's not my fault! See? It looks like it should have a keyhole or something but I can't see anything of the sort.
^And how do you know it's a locket and not a pendant?
^Well, there's a very thin gap in the middle, I can pry it a lil with a claw. But it is very rusted.
^Nope, looks like... I dunno, some metal. I'm no goldsmith.
^Well, I guess it's better than nothing, shall we leave then?
